tool_description: Verifies menu compliance with health regulations, dietary labeling requirements, and local food service laws.

finalized_menu.description: Complete menu with all dishes and ingredients

venue_type.description: Type of venue (restaurant, catering-facility, private-home, outdoor, hotel)

commercial_operation.description: Whether this is a commercial catering operation

error_messages: Empty menu: Provide at least one menu item for compliance checking.
Invalid jurisdiction: Specify a valid state/province and country combination.
Unsupported venue type: Use restaurant, catering-facility, private-home, outdoor, or hotel.
Invalid service size: Provide a positive integer between 1 and 10000.
Jurisdiction regulations unavailable: Compliance rules for specified jurisdiction are not in database.
Menu too large: Maximum 100 menu items can be checked simultaneously.
usage: Provide finalized_menu array, jurisdiction, venue_type, and service_size. Optionally specify alcohol_service and commercial_operation status. Returns compliance status and required actions.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status (compliant, minor-issues, major-issues, non-compliant)

required_permits.description: List of required permits and licenses

violations_found.description: Compliance violations that need to be addressed

recommended_actions.description: Specific actions needed to achieve compliance

inspection_requirements.description: Whether health department inspection is required
